results.content:
I wasn't going to review as it seemed a pretty standard sort of course.  I used it as a quick review as hadn't practiced for a while.  

Some stand out lectures are the ones on improving your coding with JSLint which are really helpful.  

It is a practical course more geared towards JavaScript skills than HTML/CSS.  

It includes a couple of simple interactive projects which are copy and paste code which the instructor explains but I'm not really sure how useful these are to beginners.
results.content_html:

It is a practical course more geared towards JavaScript skills than HTML/CSS.

results.content: Very clear, good presenter, great explanations and keeps to the scope of my learning expectations.

results.content: The instructor has a comfortable voice and pace in the course. Additionally I appreciate that he is very practical in his teaching style. He explains and then proceeds to show practical examples. This helps to remember and make the course lively. Thanks a lot.
